New Records: Devin Booker needs 381 more points to surpass Walter Davis as the Suns all-time leading scorer
Key Match Events: Bradley Beal notched 25 points on 10-of-15 shooting and 5 assists on Jan. 6, 2025 at Philadelphia
Devin Booker and Kevin Durant became the first Suns duo since the 1991-92 season to record 30+ points and 8+ assists in the same game on Dec.13, 2024 at Utah
Grayson Allen had a season-high 23-points on 7-of-8 shooting (5-of-6 3FG) in 27 minutes off the bench
The Suns have now won 14-straight games when shooting 57+% from the field and holding their opponent to under 50% shooting and improved to 166-6 all-time in such games
Pre-Game Insights: The Suns have won eight-straight games over the Jazz, Phoenix's second-longest winning streak over Utah in series history
The Suns swept Utah last season, the first time doing so since a 3-0 record against Utah during the 2020-21 season
The Suns have won 15 of the last 17 meetings and lead the all-time series 107-95
Post-Match Reflections: Bradley Beal posted a game-high 25 points on 11-of-16 shooting (2-of-5 3FG), 7 rebounds and 3 steals
Kevin Durant finished with 23 points on 9-of-15 shooting from the field (3-for-4 FT), to go along with 7 assists and 3 blocks
Devin Booker tallied 20 points and matched his season high for assists with a game-high 12
Grayson Allen had a season-high 23-points on 7-of-8 shooting (5-of-6 3FG) in 27 minutes off the bench
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Suns have made 505 three-pointers in the first 35 games of this season, the most in franchise history in the first 35 games of a season
Since the start of the 2020-21 season, the Suns hold a combined regular season record 226-128, the second-best record in the NBA over the last five seasons
